abstract: Employment contracts in Belgium, whether in writing or by verbal agreement, are governed by strict labor laws, royal decrees, regional decrees, collective labor agreements, work regulations and the rules created in individual labor contracts. The central source of the law of employment contract (LEC) is the Act of 3rd July 1978.
